DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study help woman lose weight gain pregnancy use SmartPhone app investigator develop call E-Moms . The investigator hypothesize mom give app use study lose weight mom use app .
DOC.brief_title: A Personalized Telehealth Intervention Health Weight Loss Postpartum Women
DOC.detailed_description: The E-Moms Study last 4 month . The weight management program 4 month long end 6 month participant 's baby bear . All participant receive Women , Infants Children ( WIC ) service . For weight management program , participant put one group : 1 . WIC Moms : receive advice service nutrition weight management pregnancy WIC clinic . 2 . WIC E-Moms : receive personalize diet exercise plan help lose weight gain pregnancy . All information give use SmartPhone , iPhone . They also get advice service WIC clinic .
DOC.criteria: Are female deliver baby within last 2 month Are 18 year age old Have body mass index â‰¥25 kg/m2 < 40 kg/m2 Are accept postpregnancy WIC service Are Englishspeaking Are participate Nurse Family Partnership program Had multiples recent pregnancy Are unwilling assigned random either 2 study group Are plan move study area within next 6 month Have history psychiatric condition chronic disease impact body weight , appetite , energy intake HIV/AIDS , cancer , bipolar disorder schizophrenia Currently use antipsychotic medication use medication previous 12 month Have diagnosis type I diabetes Report heart attack , stroke , hospitalize treated chest pain Currently take medication supplement aid weight loss Have weight loss surgery past year plan prior study completion . Currently participate another interventional study influence weight control Currently abuse drug alcohol ( 14 drink per week allow )
